description: doc/go1: the rest of the language changes

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM otherwise

http://codereview.appspot.com/5478047/diff/1/doc/go1.html
File doc/go1.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5478047/diff/1/doc/go1.html#newcode200
doc/go1.html:200: Gofix will update all references to libraries whose API has changed as a result
I don't believe Gofix does anything.
I don't believe any APIs changed (except s/int/rune/).

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ff6f8cf01348 ***

doc/go1: the rest of the language changes
